SummonMount.name: Summon Mount
SummonMount.FullTooltip: After Channeling for <c val="#TooltipNumbers">1</c> second, gain <s val="StandardTooltipDetails">30%</s> Movement Speed.

Hearthstone.name: Hearthstone
Hearthstone.FullTooltip: After Channeling for <c val="#TooltipNumbers">6</c> seconds, teleport back to the Hall of Storms, instantly restoring <c val="#TooltipNumbers">1125</c> Health and <c val="#TooltipNumbers">150</c> Mana.

HearthstoneNoMana.name: Hearthstone
HearthstoneNoMana.FullTooltip: After Channeling for <c val="#TooltipNumbers">6</c> seconds, teleport back to the Hall of Storms, instantly restoring <c val="#TooltipNumbers">1125</c> Health.

HearthstoneBrew.name: Hearthstone
HearthstoneBrew.FullTooltip: After Channeling for <c val="#TooltipNumbers">6</c> seconds, teleport back to the Hall of Storms, instantly restoring <c val="#TooltipNumbers">1125</c> Health and <c val="#TooltipNumbers">150</c> Brew.

Abathur.name: Abathur
Abathur.title: Evolution Master
Abathur.SearchText: Abathur Zerg Swarm HotS Heart of the Swarm StarCraft II 2 SC2 Star2 Starcraft2 SC slug
Abathur.Description: A unique Hero that can manipulate the battle from anywhere on the map.

AbathurSymbiote.name: Symbiote
AbathurSymbiote.ShortTooltip: Assist an ally and gain new abilities
AbathurSymbiote.FullTooltip: Spawn and attach a Symbiote to a target ally or Structure. While active, Abathur controls the Symbiote, gaining access to new Abilities. The Symbiote is able to gain XP from nearby enemy deaths.

AbathurToxicNest.name: Toxic Nest
AbathurToxicNest.FullTooltip: Spawn a mine that becomes active after a short time. Deals <c val="#TooltipNumbers">153~~0.04~~</c> damage and reveals the enemy for <c val="#TooltipNumbers">4</c> seconds. Lasts <c val="#TooltipNumbers">90</c> seconds.<n/><n/>Stores up to <c val="#TooltipNumbers">3</c> charges.

AbathurUltimateEvolution.name: Ultimate Evolution
AbathurUltimateEvolution.ShortTooltip: Clone target allied Hero and control it
AbathurUltimateEvolution.FullTooltip: Clone target allied Hero and control it for <c val="#TooltipNumbers">20</c> seconds. Abathur has perfected the clone, granting it <c val="#TooltipNumbers">20%</c> Spell Power, <c val="#TooltipNumbers">20%</c> bonus Attack Damage, and <c val="#TooltipNumbers">10%</c> bonus Movement Speed. Cannot use their Heroic Ability.

AbathurEvolveMonstrosity.name: Evolve Monstrosity
AbathurEvolveMonstrosity.ShortTooltip: Minion or Locust becomes a powerful Monstrosity
AbathurEvolveMonstrosity.FullTooltip: Turn an allied Minion or Locust into a Monstrosity. When enemy Minions near the Monstrosity die, it gains <c val="#TooltipNumbers">2%</c> Health and <c val="#TooltipNumbers">2%</c> Basic Attack damage, stacking up to <c val="#TooltipNumbers">40</c> times. The Monstrosity can be healed by Carapace and has the ability to Burrow to a visible location every <c val="#TooltipNumbers">80</c> seconds.<n/><n/>Using Symbiote on the Monstrosity allows Abathur to control it, in addition to Symbiote's normal benefits. This Ability can be reactivated to automatically cast Symbiote on his Monstrosity.

AbathurSpawnLocusts.name: Locust Strain
AbathurSpawnLocusts.ShortTooltip: Spawn locusts that attack down the nearest lane
AbathurSpawnLocusts.FullTooltip: Spawns a Locust to attack down the nearest lane every <c val="#TooltipNumbers">15</c> seconds. Locusts last for <c val="#TooltipNumbers">16</c> seconds, have <c val="#TooltipNumbers">316~~0.04~~</c> health and deal <c val="#TooltipNumbers">46~~0.04~~</c> damage with each Basic Attack.

AbathurDeepTunnel.name: Deep Tunnel
AbathurDeepTunnel.FullTooltip: Quickly tunnel to a visible location

AbathurMasteryPressurizedGlands.name: Pressurized Glands
AbathurMasteryPressurizedGlands.ShortTooltip: Increases Spike Burst range and decreases cooldown
AbathurMasteryPressurizedGlands.FullTooltip: Increases the range of Symbiote's Spike Burst by <c val="#TooltipNumbers">25%</c> and decreases the cooldown by <c val="#TooltipNumbers">1</c> second.

AbathurMasteryEnvenomedNestsToxicNest.name: Envenomed Nest
AbathurMasteryEnvenomedNestsToxicNest.FullTooltip: Toxic Nests deal <c val="#TooltipNumbers">75%</c> more damage over <c val="#TooltipNumbers">3</c> seconds.

AbathurReinforcedCarapace.name: Reinforced Carapace
AbathurReinforcedCarapace.FullTooltip: Increase the Shield amount of Carapace by 30%.

AbathurCombatStyleSurvivalInstincts.name: Survival Instincts
AbathurCombatStyleSurvivalInstincts.FullTooltip: Increases Locust's Health by <c val="#TooltipNumbers">100%</c> and damage by <c val="#TooltipNumbers">60%</c>.

AbathurSymbioteAdrenalOverload.name: Adrenal Overload
AbathurSymbioteAdrenalOverload.FullTooltip: Heroic Symbiote hosts gain <c val="#TooltipNumbers">25%</c> increased Attack Speed.

AbathurMasteryNeedlespine.name: Needlespine
AbathurMasteryNeedlespine.FullTooltip: Increases the damage and range of Symbiote's Stab by <c val="#TooltipNumbers">20%</c>.

AbathurMasteryProlificDispersal.name: Prolific Dispersal
AbathurMasteryProlificDispersal.FullTooltip: Increase the range of Toxic Nest by <c val="#TooltipNumbers">30%</c>, reduce its cooldown by <c val="#TooltipNumbers">2</c> seconds, and add <c val="#TooltipNumbers">2</c> additional charges.

AbathurMasteryVileNestsToxicNest.name: Vile Nest
AbathurMasteryVileNestsToxicNest.FullTooltip: Toxic Nests Slow enemy Movement Speed by <c val="#TooltipNumbers">40%</c> for <c val="#TooltipNumbers">2.5</c> seconds.

AbathurSymbioteCarapaceNetworkedCarapace.name: Networked Carapace
AbathurSymbioteCarapaceNetworkedCarapace.FullTooltip: Using Symbiote's Carapace also applies an untalented Carapace Shield to all nearby allied Heroes, Minions, and Mercenaries.

GenericTalentCalldownMULE.name: Calldown: MULE
GenericTalentCalldownMULE.FullTooltip: Activate to calldown a Mule that repairs Structures, one at a time, near target point for <c val="#TooltipNumbers">40</c> seconds, healing for <c val="#TooltipNumbers">90</c> Health every <c val="#TooltipNumbers">1</c> second.

AbathurHeroicAbilityUltimateEvolution.name: Ultimate Evolution
AbathurHeroicAbilityUltimateEvolution.ShortTooltip: Clone target allied Hero and control it
AbathurHeroicAbilityUltimateEvolution.FullTooltip: Clone target allied Hero and control it for <c val="#TooltipNumbers">20</c> seconds. Abathur has perfected the clone, granting it <c val="#TooltipNumbers">20%</c> Spell Power, <c val="#TooltipNumbers">20%</c> bonus Attack Damage, and <c val="#TooltipNumbers">10%</c> bonus Movement Speed. Cannot use their Heroic Ability.

AbathurHeroicAbilityEvolveMonstrosity.name: Evolve Monstrosity
AbathurHeroicAbilityEvolveMonstrosity.ShortTooltip: Minion or Locust becomes a powerful Monstrosity
AbathurHeroicAbilityEvolveMonstrosity.FullTooltip: Turn an allied Minion or Locust into a Monstrosity. When enemy Minions near the Monstrosity die, it gains <c val="#TooltipNumbers">2%</c> Health and <c val="#TooltipNumbers">2%</c> Basic Attack damage, stacking up to <c val="#TooltipNumbers">40</c> times. The Monstrosity can be healed by Carapace and has the ability to Burrow to a visible location every <c val="#TooltipNumbers">80</c> seconds.<n/><n/>Using Symbiote on the Monstrosity allows Abathur to control it, in addition to Symbiote's normal benefits. This Ability can be reactivated to automatically cast Symbiote on his Monstrosity.

AbathurMasterySpatialEfficiency.name: Spatial Efficiency
AbathurMasterySpatialEfficiency.FullTooltip: Symbiote's Stab gains <c val="#TooltipNumbers">1</c> additional charge and its cooldown is reduced by <c val="#TooltipNumbers">.5</c> seconds.

AbathurSymbioteSpikeBurstSomaTransferenc.name: Soma Transference
AbathurSymbioteSpikeBurstSomaTransferenc.ShortTooltip: Spike Burst heals for each Hero hit
AbathurSymbioteSpikeBurstSomaTransferenc.FullTooltip: Symbiote's Spike Burst heals the host for <c val="#TooltipNumbers">64~~0.04~~</c> Health per enemy Hero hit.

AbathurCombatStyleBombardStrain.name: Bombard Strain
AbathurCombatStyleBombardStrain.ShortTooltip: Locusts gain a ranged attack, increased duration
AbathurCombatStyleBombardStrain.FullTooltip: Locust's Basic Attacks become a long-range siege attack and their duration is increased by <c val="#TooltipNumbers">75%</c>.

AbathurMasteryEnvenomedSpikes.name: Envenomed Spikes
AbathurMasteryEnvenomedSpikes.FullTooltip: Abathur's Symbiote's Spike Burst also Slows enemy Movement Speed by <c val="#TooltipNumbers">40%</c> for <c val="#TooltipNumbers">2</c> seconds.

AbathurMasteryAdrenalineBoost.name: Adrenaline Boost
AbathurMasteryAdrenalineBoost.FullTooltip: Symbiote's Carapace increases the Movement Speed of the target by <c val="#TooltipNumbers">40%</c> for <c val="#TooltipNumbers">3.5</c> seconds.

AbathurVolatileMutation.name: Volatile Mutation
AbathurVolatileMutation.FullTooltip: Ultimate Evolution clones and Monstrosities deal <c val="#TooltipNumbers">137~~0.04~~</c> damage to nearby enemies every <c val="#TooltipNumbers">3</c> seconds and when they die. Enemy Heroes hit heal the clone or Monstrosity for <c val="#TooltipNumbers">75%</c> of the damage dealt.

AbathurCombatStyleLocustBrood.name: Locust Brood
AbathurCombatStyleLocustBrood.FullTooltip: Activate to spawn <c val="#TooltipNumbers">3</c> Locusts at a nearby location.

AbathurUltimateEvolutionEvolutionaryLink.name: Evolutionary Link
AbathurUltimateEvolutionEvolutionaryLink.ShortTooltip: Ultimate Evolution target gets a Shield
AbathurUltimateEvolutionEvolutionaryLink.FullTooltip: Increase the duration of Ultimate Evolution by <c val="#TooltipNumbers">50%</c>. As long as the Ultimate Evolution is alive, the original target of the clone gains a Shield equal to <c val="#TooltipNumbers">25%</c> of their maximum Health. Refreshes every <c val="#TooltipNumbers">5</c> seconds.

AbathurMasteryEvolutionComplete.name: Evolution Complete
AbathurMasteryEvolutionComplete.FullTooltip: Increase Monstrosity's Basic Attack damage by <c val="#TooltipNumbers">100%</c>.

AbathurSymbioteHivemind.name: Hivemind
AbathurSymbioteHivemind.FullTooltip: Symbiote creates an additional Symbiote on a nearby allied Hero. This Symbiote mimics the commands of the first, but does half damage and Shielding.

AbathurMasteryLocustMaster.name: Locust Nest
AbathurMasteryLocustMaster.FullTooltip: Activate to create a nest that periodically spawns Locusts. Only one Locust Nest can be active at a time.

AbathurSymbioteStab.name: Stab
AbathurSymbioteStab.ShortTooltip: Shoots a spike that deals damage to the first enemy it contacts.
AbathurSymbioteStab.FullTooltip: Shoots a spike towards target area that deals <c val="#TooltipNumbers">119~~0.04~~</c> damage to the first enemy it contacts.

AbathurSymbioteSpikeBurst.name: Spike Burst
AbathurSymbioteSpikeBurst.FullTooltip: Deals <c val="#TooltipNumbers">120~~0.04~~</c> damage to nearby enemies.

AbathurSymbioteCarapace.name: Carapace
AbathurSymbioteCarapace.FullTooltip: Shields the assisted ally for <c val="#TooltipNumbers">150~~0.04~~</c>. Allied Heroes are healed for <c val="#TooltipNumbers">22~~0.04~~</c> Health per second while the Shield is active. Lasts for <c val="#TooltipNumbers">6</c> seconds.

Alarak.name: Alarak
Alarak.title: Highlord of the Tal'darim
Alarak.SearchText: Alarak Ascendant Protoss SC SC2 StarCraft Star2 Starcraft2 II 2 Legacy of the Void LotV Covert Ops CO
Alarak.Description: A combo Assassin that can move enemies around and punish mistakes.

AlarakDiscordStrike.name: Discord Strike
AlarakDiscordStrike.ShortTooltip: Damage and silence enemies in an area
AlarakDiscordStrike.FullTooltip: After a <c val="#TooltipNumbers">0.5</c> second delay, enemies in front of Alarak take <c val="#TooltipNumbers">175~~0.04~~</c> damage and are silenced for <c val="#TooltipNumbers">1.5</c> seconds.

AlarakTelekinesis.name: Telekinesis
AlarakTelekinesis.FullTooltip: <c val="#TooltipNumbers">Vector Targeting</c><n/>Create a force, pushing Alarak and all enemies hit from the targeted point towards the targeted direction. Deals <c val="#TooltipNumbers">48~~0.04~~</c> damage to enemies.

AlarakLightningSurge.name: Lightning Surge
AlarakLightningSurge.FullTooltip: Deal <c val="#TooltipNumbers">62~~0.04~~</c> damage to an enemy and an additional <c val="#TooltipNumbers">100%</c> damage to enemies between Alarak and the target. Restore <c val="#TooltipNumbers">70~~0.04~~</c> health for each Hero hit.

AlarakDeadlyChargeActivate.name: Deadly Charge
AlarakDeadlyChargeActivate.ShortTooltip: Channel to charge a long distance
AlarakDeadlyChargeActivate.FullTooltip: After channeling, Alarak charges forward dealing <c val="#TooltipNumbers">200~~0.04~~</c> damage to all enemies in his path. Distance is increased based on the amount of time channeled, up to <c val="#TooltipNumbers">1.5</c> seconds.<n/><n/>Issuing a Move order while this is channeling will cancel it at no cost. Taking damage will interrupt the channeling.

AlarakCounterStrikeTargeted.name: Counter-Strike
AlarakCounterStrikeTargeted.ShortTooltip: Prevents damage to deal damage in a large area
AlarakCounterStrikeTargeted.FullTooltip: Alarak targets an area and channels for <c val="#TooltipNumbers">1</c> second, becoming Protected and Unstoppable. After, if he took damage from an enemy Hero, he sends a shockwave that deals <c val="#TooltipNumbers">275~~0.04~~</c> damage.

AlarakSadismDummyUI.name: Sadism
AlarakSadismDummyUI.ShortTooltip: Alarak deals increased damage and has increased self-healing against enemy Heroes
AlarakSadismDummyUI.FullTooltip: Alarak's Ability damage and self-healing are increased by 100% against enemy Heroes.Repeatable Quest: Takedowns increase Sadism by 3%, up to 30%. Sadism gained from Takedowns is lost on death.

AlarakRuthlessMomentum.name: Ruthless Momentum
AlarakRuthlessMomentum.FullTooltip: Reduce the Mana cost of Telekinesis from <c val="#TooltipNumbers">30</c> to <c val="#TooltipNumbers">20.</c> Telekinesis's cooldown recharges <c val="#TooltipNumbers">100%</c> faster while above <c val="#TooltipNumbers">75%</c> Health.

AlarakSustainingPower.name: Sustaining Power
AlarakSustainingPower.FullTooltip: Increase the healing received from damaging Heroes with Lightning Surge by <c val="#TooltipNumbers">40%</c>.

AlarakExtendedLightning.name: Extended Lightning
AlarakExtendedLightning.ShortTooltip: <c val="#TooltipQuest">Quest:</c> Reduce Sadism, empower Lightning Surge
AlarakExtendedLightning.FullTooltip: Reduce Sadism by 10%.Quest: Hit Heroes with the center of Lightning Surge.Reward: After hitting 5 Heroes, increase Lightning Surge's range by 20%.Reward: After hitting 15 Heroes, Lightning Surge's center also Slows enemies by 40% for 2 seconds.Reward: After hitting 3 Heroes with the center of a single cast, increase Sadism by 10% and instantly gain all other Rewards.

AlarakChaosReigns.name: Chaos Reigns
AlarakChaosReigns.ShortTooltip: <c val="#TooltipQuest">Quest:</c> Hit Heroes to increase Discord Strike damage
AlarakChaosReigns.FullTooltip: Quest: Hit Heroes with Discord Strike.Reward: After hitting 15 Heroes, increase Discord Strike's damage by 50.Reward: After hitting 2 Heroes with a single Discord Strike, increase its damage by 50.Reward: After hitting 3 Heroes with a single Discord Strike, increase its damage by 80 and instantly gain all other Rewards.

AlarakNegativelyCharged.name: Negatively Charged
AlarakNegativelyCharged.ShortTooltip: <c val="#TooltipQuest">Quest:</c> Increase Lightning Surge center damage
AlarakNegativelyCharged.FullTooltip: Increase the Lightning Surge damage bonus to enemies between Alarak and his victim to 150%.Repeatable Quest: Each Hero hit by the center of Lightning Surge permanently increases the damage bonus by 5%.

AlarakShowofForce.name: Show of Force
AlarakShowofForce.FullTooltip: Heroes hit with <c val="#TooltipNumbers">3</c> of Alarak's Abilities within <c val="#TooltipNumbers">2</c> seconds take an additional <c val="#TooltipNumbers">80~~0.04~~</c> damage.

AlarakDissonance.name: Dissonance
AlarakDissonance.FullTooltip: Increase Discord Strike's Silence duration by <c val="#TooltipNumbers">0.75</c> seconds.

AlarakHinderedMotion.name: Hindered Motion
AlarakHinderedMotion.FullTooltip: Telekinesis Slows enemies by <c val="#TooltipNumbers">25%</c> for <c val="#TooltipNumbers">2</c> seconds.

AlarakAppliedForce.name: Applied Force
AlarakAppliedForce.ShortTooltip: Reduce Sadism, increase Telekinesis distance, range
AlarakAppliedForce.FullTooltip: Reduce Sadism by <c val="#TooltipNumbers">10%</c>, but Telekinesis pushes <c val="#TooltipNumbers">20%</c> further and has <c val="#TooltipNumbers">20% </c>increased range.

AlarakDeadlyChargeFirstHeroic.name: Deadly Charge
AlarakDeadlyChargeFirstHeroic.ShortTooltip: Channel to charge a long distance
AlarakDeadlyChargeFirstHeroic.FullTooltip: After channeling, Alarak charges forward dealing <c val="#TooltipNumbers">200~~0.04~~</c> damage to all enemies in his path. Distance is increased based on the amount of time channeled, up to <c val="#TooltipNumbers">1.5</c> seconds.<n/><n/>Issuing a Move order while this is channeling will cancel it at no cost. Taking damage will interrupt the channeling.

AlarakHeroicAbilityCounterStrike.name: Counter-Strike
AlarakHeroicAbilityCounterStrike.ShortTooltip: Prevents damage to deal damage in a large area
AlarakHeroicAbilityCounterStrike.FullTooltip: Alarak targets an area and channels for <c val="#TooltipNumbers">1</c> second, becoming Protected and Unstoppable. After, if he took damage from an enemy Hero, he sends a shockwave that deals <c val="#TooltipNumbers">275~~0.04~~</c> damage.

AlarakBladeoftheHighlord.name: Blade of the Highlord
AlarakBladeoftheHighlord.FullTooltip: Basic Attacks against Heroes increase Sadism by <c val="#TooltipNumbers">2%</c> stacking up to <c val="#TooltipNumbers">40%</c>.<n/><n/>Sadism gained from Blade of the Highlord is lost on death.

AlarakPureMalice.name: Pure Malice
AlarakPureMalice.FullTooltip: Increase Sadism by <c val="#TooltipNumbers">10%</c> any time an allied Hero dies, up to <c val="#TooltipNumbers">40%</c>.<n/><n/>Sadism gained from Pure Malice is lost on death.

AlarakRiteofRakShir.name: Rite of Rak'Shir
AlarakRiteofRakShir.ShortTooltip: Mark and damage Hero to increase Sadism
AlarakRiteofRakShir.FullTooltip: Activate to mark an enemy Hero for <c val="#TooltipNumbers">300</c> seconds.<n/><n/>Hitting the marked Hero with Discord Strike increases Sadism by <c val="#TooltipNumbers">3%</c>. Killing the marked Hero increases Sadism by <c val="#TooltipNumbers">5%</c> and lowers the cooldown of Rite of Rak'Shir to <c val="#TooltipNumbers">10</c> seconds.<n/><n/>Sadism gained from Rite of Rak'Shir is lost on death.

AlarakLethalOnslaughtDiscordStrike.name: Lethal Onslaught
AlarakLethalOnslaughtDiscordStrike.ShortTooltip: Discord Strike grants Sadism bonus to Basic Attacks
AlarakLethalOnslaughtDiscordStrike.FullTooltip: Hitting an enemy Hero with Discord Strike grants <c val="#TooltipNumbers">50%</c> of Sadism's damage bonus to Alarak's Basic Attacks for <c val="#TooltipNumbers">4</c> seconds. Basic Attacks against Heroes refresh this duration.

AlarakLightningBarrage.name: Lightning Barrage
AlarakLightningBarrage.ShortTooltip: Center hits grant free Lightning Surge cast
AlarakLightningBarrage.FullTooltip: Hitting an enemy Hero with the center of Lightning Surge allows it to be cast again for free on a different primary target within the next <c val="#TooltipNumbers">2</c> seconds. This free cast cannot benefit from Lightning Barrage.

AlarakMockingStrikes.name: Mocking Strikes
AlarakMockingStrikes.FullTooltip: Basic Attacks against Stunned, Silenced, Slowed, or Rooted Heroes reduce the cooldown of Alarak's Basic Abilities by <c val="#TooltipNumbers">3</c> seconds.

AlarakCounterStrikeItem.name: Counter-Strike
AlarakCounterStrikeItem.ShortTooltip: Prevents damage to deal damage in a large area
AlarakCounterStrikeItem.FullTooltip: Alarak targets an area and channels for <c val="#TooltipNumbers">1</c> second, becoming Protected and Unstoppable. After, if he took damage from an enemy Hero, he sends a shockwave that deals <c val="#TooltipNumbers">275~~0.04~~</c> damage.<n/><n/><c val="ffff8a">This ability will take over Alarak's Trait button.</c>

AlarakDeadlyChargeSecondHeroic.name: Deadly Charge
AlarakDeadlyChargeSecondHeroic.ShortTooltip: Channel to charge a long distance
AlarakDeadlyChargeSecondHeroic.FullTooltip: After channeling, Alarak charges forward dealing <c val="#TooltipNumbers">200~~0.04~~</c> damage to all enemies in his path. Distance is increased based on the amount of time channeled, up to <c val="#TooltipNumbers">1.5</c> seconds.<n/><n/>Issuing a Move order while this is channeling will cancel it at no cost. Taking damage will interrupt the channeling.

AlarakLastLaugh.name: Last Laugh
AlarakLastLaugh.ShortTooltip: Cleanse and teleport, but reduce Health
AlarakLastLaugh.FullTooltip: Activate to teleport to the chosen location and remove all Roots, Slows, and damage over time effects. If Alarak fails to hit enemy Heroes <c val="#TooltipNumbers">3</c> times with Basic Abilities within <c val="#TooltipNumbers">4</c> seconds of using Last Laugh, his Health is reduced to <c val="#TooltipNumbers">1</c>.

AlarakHastyBargain.name: Hasty Bargain
AlarakHastyBargain.ShortTooltip: Activate to reduce Sadism bonus and reset Basic Ability cooldowns
AlarakHastyBargain.FullTooltip: Activate to permanently reduce Alarak's Sadism by <c val="#TooltipNumbers">4%</c> and reset the cooldowns of his Basic Abilities.

Alexstrasza.name: Alexstrasza
Alexstrasza.title: The Life-Binder
Alexstrasza.SearchText: Alexstraza Alekstrasza Alekstraza Warcraft 2 WC2 WoW Cataclysm Wrath of the Lich King WotLK dragon elf Queen of Dragons
Alexstrasza.Description: A Healer who shares her Health with allies and can transform into a Dragon to empower her Abilities.

AlexstraszaGiftOfLife.name: Gift of Life
AlexstraszaGiftOfLife.ShortTooltip: Give a portion of Health to an allied Hero
AlexstraszaGiftOfLife.FullTooltip: Sacrifice <c val="#TooltipNumbers">15%</c> of Alexstrasza's current Health, healing an allied Hero for <c val="#TooltipNumbers">150%</c> of that amount.<n/><n/><c val="#ColorViolet">Dragonqueen: Breath of Life</c><n/>Cooldown greatly reduced and does not cost Health.

AlexstraszaAbundance.name: Abundance
AlexstraszaAbundance.ShortTooltip: Heal allied Heroes in an area
AlexstraszaAbundance.FullTooltip: Plant a seed of healing that blooms after <c val="#TooltipNumbers">3</c> seconds, healing nearby allied Heroes for <c val="#TooltipNumbers">20%</c> of their maximum Health.<n/><n/><c val="#ColorViolet">Dragonqueen: Preservation</c><n/>Heal area and amount greatly increased.

AlexstraszaFlameBuffet.name: Flame Buffet
AlexstraszaFlameBuffet.ShortTooltip: Launch a fireball that ignites enemies and can Slow them
AlexstraszaFlameBuffet.FullTooltip: Launch a fireball, Burning enemies hit for <c val="#TooltipNumbers">75~~0.04~~</c> damage over <c val="#TooltipNumbers">5.5</c> seconds.<n/><n/>Hitting enemies that are already Burning deals <c val="#TooltipNumbers">125~~0.04~~</c> bonus damage upon impact, Slows them by <c val="#TooltipNumbers">40%</c> decaying over <c val="#TooltipNumbers">2</c> seconds, and refunds the Mana cost.<n/><n/><c val="#ColorViolet">Dragonqueen: Wing Buffet</c><n/>Damage and Knockback enemies in an arc.

AlexstraszaLifebinder.name: Life-Binder
AlexstraszaLifebinder.ShortTooltip: Link Alexstrasza's Health with an ally
AlexstraszaLifebinder.FullTooltip: Bind Alexstrasza's life force with an allied Hero. Both her and her target are healed for <c val="#TooltipNumbers">480~~0.04~~</c> Health over <c val="#TooltipNumbers">2</c> seconds. Afterwards, the Hero with a lower percentage of Health is healed to the same Health percentage as the other Hero.

AlexstraszaCleansingFlame.name: Cleansing Flame
AlexstraszaCleansingFlame.ShortTooltip: Rain healing and damaging fire from the sky
AlexstraszaCleansingFlame.FullTooltip: After <c val="#TooltipNumbers">1.25</c> seconds, take to the sky and drop <c val="#TooltipNumbers">5</c> fireballs over <c val="#TooltipNumbers">6</c> seconds at the position of the mouse cursor. Fireballs deal <c val="#TooltipNumbers">135~~0.04~~</c> damage to enemies and heal allied Heroes for <c val="#TooltipNumbers">300~~0.04~~</c> Health.<n/><n/><c val="#TooltipNumbers">2</c> seconds after dropping all fireballs, Alexstrasza lands at the position of the mouse cursor.

AlexstraszaDragonqueen.name: Dragonqueen
AlexstraszaDragonqueen.ShortTooltip: Transform into a dragon aspect with empowered Abilities
AlexstraszaDragonqueen.FullTooltip: After <c val="#TooltipNumbers">1.25</c> seconds, transform into a dragon and gain <c val="#TooltipNumbers">500~~0.04~~</c> Health.<n/><n/>While Dragonqueen is active, Alexstrasza's Abilities are empowered, and her Basic Attacks deal <c val="#TooltipNumbers">143~~0.04~~</c> damage and heal allied Heroes for <c val="#TooltipNumbers">43~~0.04~~</c> in an arc in front of her. Additionally, the duration of incoming Stuns, Roots, and Slows, is reduced by <c val="#TooltipNumbers">50%</c>.<n/><n/>Lasts <c val="#TooltipNumbers">15</c> seconds.

AlexstraszaLiveAndLetLiveGiftOfLife.name: Live and Let Live
AlexstraszaLiveAndLetLiveGiftOfLife.ShortTooltip: High Health reduces Gift of Life cooldown
AlexstraszaLiveAndLetLiveGiftOfLife.FullTooltip: While Alexstrasza is above <c val="#TooltipNumbers">75%</c> Health, Gift of Life's cooldown recharges <c val="#TooltipNumbers">100%</c> faster.

AlexstraszaCircleOfLifeAbundance.name: Circle of Life
AlexstraszaCircleOfLifeAbundance.FullTooltip: Quest: Collect Regeneration Globes.Reward: After collecting 15 Regeneration Globes, Abundance heals for an additional 5% maximum Health.Reward: After collecting 25 Regeneration Globes, Abundance's healing burst creates a Regeneration Globe.

AlexstraszaFlamesOfFuryFlameBuffet.name: Flames of Fury
AlexstraszaFlamesOfFuryFlameBuffet.ShortTooltip: <c val="#TooltipQuest">Quest:</c> Flame Buffet reduces Dragonqueen cooldown
AlexstraszaFlamesOfFuryFlameBuffet.FullTooltip: Quest: Hit 20 Burning Heroes with Flame Buffet.Reward: Hitting a Burning Hero with Flame Buffet reduces Dragonqueen's cooldown by 5 seconds.

AlexstraszaSurgeOfVitalityAbundance.name: Surge of Vitality
AlexstraszaSurgeOfVitalityAbundance.FullTooltip: Abundance's healing burst grants allied Heroes <c val="#TooltipNumbers">30%</c> Movement Speed for <c val="#TooltipNumbers">3</c> seconds.

AlexstraszaHeatExhaustionFlameBuffet.name: Heat Exhaustion
AlexstraszaHeatExhaustionFlameBuffet.FullTooltip: Increase Flame Buffet's initial Slow from <c val="#TooltipNumbers">40%</c> to <c val="#TooltipNumbers">60%</c>.

AlexstraszaExuberance.name: Exuberance
AlexstraszaExuberance.FullTooltip: While above <c val="#TooltipNumbers">75%</c> Health, gain <c val="#TooltipNumbers">15%</c> Movement Speed.

AlexstraszaLifeblossomGiftOfLife.name: Lifeblossom
AlexstraszaLifeblossomGiftOfLife.ShortTooltip: Gift of Life creates a Lifeblossom at high Health
AlexstraszaLifeblossomGiftOfLife.FullTooltip: While Alexstrasza is above <c val="#TooltipNumbers">75%</c> Health, Gift of Life creates a Lifeblossom at the target's location. Alexstrasza can collect the Lifeblossom to make her next Gift of Life cost no Health.

AlexstraszaVerdantFlourishAbundance.name: Verdant Flourish
AlexstraszaVerdantFlourishAbundance.ShortTooltip: Regen Globe and Abundance healing increased
AlexstraszaVerdantFlourishAbundance.FullTooltip: Alexstrasza receives <c val="#TooltipNumbers">30%</c> more healing from Abundance and <c val="#TooltipNumbers">100%</c> more healing from Regeneration Globes.

AlexstraszaFireWithinFlameBuffet.name: Fire Within
AlexstraszaFireWithinFlameBuffet.FullTooltip: Hitting a Burning Hero with Flame Buffet heals Alexstrasza for <c val="#TooltipNumbers">10%</c> of her maximum Health.

AlexstraszaLifebinder.name: Life-Binder
AlexstraszaLifebinder.ShortTooltip: Link Alexstrasza's Health with an ally
AlexstraszaLifebinder.FullTooltip: Bind Alexstrasza's life force with an allied Hero. Both her and her target are healed for <c val="#TooltipNumbers">480~~0.04~~</c> Health over <c val="#TooltipNumbers">2</c> seconds. Afterwards, the Hero with a lower percentage of Health is healed to the same Health percentage as the other Hero.

AlexstraszaCleansingFlame.name: Cleansing Flame
AlexstraszaCleansingFlame.ShortTooltip: Rain healing and damaging fire from the sky
AlexstraszaCleansingFlame.FullTooltip: After <c val="#TooltipNumbers">1.25</c> seconds, take to the sky and drop <c val="#TooltipNumbers">5</c> fireballs over <c val="#TooltipNumbers">6</c> seconds at the position of the mouse cursor. Fireballs deal <c val="#TooltipNumbers">135~~0.04~~</c> damage to enemies and heal allied Heroes for <c val="#TooltipNumbers">300~~0.04~~</c> Health.<n/><n/><c val="#TooltipNumbers">2</c> seconds after dropping all fireballs, Alexstrasza lands at the position of the mouse cursor.

AlexstraszaDragonScales.name: Dragon Scales
AlexstraszaDragonScales.FullTooltip: Gain <c val="#TooltipNumbers">40</c> Armor while Stunned, Rooted, or Silenced, and for <c val="#TooltipNumbers">2</c> seconds after. Can only trigger once every <c val="#TooltipNumbers">10</c> seconds.

AlexstraszaPacify.name: Pacify
AlexstraszaPacify.ShortTooltip: Slow an enemy Hero and reduce their damage
AlexstraszaPacify.FullTooltip: Activate to Slow and reduce an enemy Hero's damage by <c val="#TooltipNumbers">50%</c> for <c val="#TooltipNumbers">3</c> seconds.<n/><n/>Healing a Stunned, Rooted, or Silenced ally reduces Pacify's cooldown by <c val="#TooltipNumbers">30</c> seconds.

AlexstraszaLifeUnbound.name: Life Unbound
AlexstraszaLifeUnbound.ShortTooltip: Heal an ally and damage enemies
AlexstraszaLifeUnbound.FullTooltip: Activate to heal an allied Hero for <c val="#TooltipNumbers">15%</c> of their maximum Health and deal <c val="#TooltipNumbers">200~~0.04~~</c> damage to nearby enemies.<n/><n/>Healing a Stunned, Rooted, or Silenced ally reduces Life Unbound's cooldown by <c val="#TooltipNumbers">30</c> seconds.<n/><n/><c val="ffff8a">Cannot be used on Alexstrasza.</c>

AlexstraszaToughLoveGiftOfLife.name: Tough Love
AlexstraszaToughLoveGiftOfLife.ShortTooltip: Gift of Life grants Armor at high Health
AlexstraszaToughLoveGiftOfLife.FullTooltip: While Alexstrasza is above <c val="#TooltipNumbers">75%</c> Health, Gift of Life grants its target <c val="#TooltipNumbers">20</c> Armor for <c val="#TooltipNumbers">2</c> seconds.

AlexstraszaOverprotectiveAbundance.name: Overprotective
AlexstraszaOverprotectiveAbundance.FullTooltip: Heroes healed by Abundance gain a Shield for <c val="#TooltipNumbers">3</c> seconds equal to <c val="#TooltipNumbers">60%</c> of the amount healed.

AlexstraszaDraconicDisciplineDragonqueen.name: Draconic Discipline
AlexstraszaDraconicDisciplineDragonqueen.FullTooltip: Increase Dragonqueen's duration by <c val="#TooltipNumbers">7</c> seconds.

AlexstraszaRitualOfLife.name: Ritual of Life
AlexstraszaRitualOfLife.FullTooltip: Life-Binder activates <c val="#TooltipNumbers">3</c> times over <c val="#TooltipNumbers">6</c> seconds.

AlexstraszaOnRubyWingsCleansingFlame.name: On Ruby Wings
AlexstraszaOnRubyWingsCleansingFlame.FullTooltip: Healing or damaging Heroes <c val="#TooltipNumbers">8</c> or more times with Cleansing Flame activates Dragonqueen for <c val="#TooltipNumbers">15</c> seconds upon landing.

AlexstraszaAncientFlameFlameBuffet.name: Ancient Flame
AlexstraszaAncientFlameFlameBuffet.FullTooltip: While Dragonqueen is active, Alexstrasza's Basic Attacks apply Flame Buffet, but her Attack Speed is reduced by <c val="#TooltipNumbers">25%</c>.

AlexstraszaBlessingOfTheRed.name: Blessing of the Red
AlexstraszaBlessingOfTheRed.ShortTooltip: Grant bonus Health to an ally
AlexstraszaBlessingOfTheRed.FullTooltip: Activate to grant an allied Hero <c val="#TooltipNumbers">500</c> bonus maximum Health until they die.<n/><n/>Cannot be used on Alexstrasza, or on a Hero who already has Blessing of the Red.

AlexstraszaBreathOfLife.name: Breath of Life
AlexstraszaBreathOfLife.FullTooltip: Heal an allied Hero for <c val="#TooltipNumbers">20%</c> of Alexstrasza's current Health.

AlexstraszaPreservation.name: Preservation
AlexstraszaPreservation.ShortTooltip: Heal allied Heroes in an area
AlexstraszaPreservation.FullTooltip: Plant a seed of healing that blooms after <c val="#TooltipNumbers">3</c> seconds, healing nearby allied Heroes for <c val="#TooltipNumbers">30%</c> of their maximum Health.

AlexstraszaWingBuffet.name: Wing Buffet
AlexstraszaWingBuffet.FullTooltip: Deal <c val="#TooltipNumbers">150~~0.04~~</c> damage to enemies in an area, knocking them back and Slowing them by <c val="#TooltipNumbers">50%</c> for <c val="#TooltipNumbers">3</c> seconds.

AlexstraszaCleansingFlameDragonqueen.name: Cleansing Flame
AlexstraszaCleansingFlameDragonqueen.ShortTooltip: Rain healing and damaging fire from the sky
AlexstraszaCleansingFlameDragonqueen.FullTooltip: Take to the sky and drop <c val="#TooltipNumbers">5</c> fireballs over <c val="#TooltipNumbers">6</c> seconds at the position of the mouse cursor. Fireballs deal <c val="#TooltipNumbers">135~~0.04~~</c> damage to enemies and heal allied Heroes for <c val="#TooltipNumbers">300~~0.04~~</c> Health.<n/><n/><c val="#TooltipNumbers">2</c> seconds after dropping all fireballs, Alexstrasza lands at the position of the mouse cursor.

Ana.name: Ana
Ana.title: Veteran Sniper
Ana.Description: A burst Healer who uses precise skillshots to heal allies and can deny enemy healing.

AnaHealingDart.name: Healing Dart
AnaHealingDart.ShortTooltip: Shoot a dart that heals an Ally
AnaHealingDart.FullTooltip: Fire a dart which heals the first allied Hero hit for <c val="#TooltipNumbers">195~~0.04~~</c> Health. Does not affect full Health Heroes.

AnaBioticGrenade.name: Biotic Grenade
AnaBioticGrenade.ShortTooltip: Toss a grenade that heals allies, prevents enemy healing
AnaBioticGrenade.FullTooltip: Toss a grenade at the target area. Allied Heroes hit are healed for <c val="#TooltipNumbers">166~~0.04~~</c> Health and receive <c val="#TooltipNumbers">25%</c> increased healing from Ana for <c val="#TooltipNumbers">4</c> seconds. Enemies hit take <c val="#TooltipNumbers">60~~0.04~~</c> damage and receive <c val="#TooltipNumbers">100%</c> less healing for <c val="#TooltipNumbers">2</c> seconds.

AnaSleepDart.name: Sleep Dart
AnaSleepDart.ShortTooltip: Fire a dart that puts enemies to Sleep
AnaSleepDart.FullTooltip: Fire a dart that puts the first enemy Hero hit to Sleep, Stunning them for <c val="#TooltipNumbers">3</c> seconds. Sleep's effects end instantly if the target takes damage after the first <c val="#TooltipNumbers">0.5</c> seconds.<n/><n/><c val="ffff8a">Cannot be used on Vehicles.</c>

AnaNanoBoost.name: Nano Boost
AnaNanoBoost.ShortTooltip: Grant ally Spell Power, reduced cooldowns
AnaNanoBoost.FullTooltip: Instantly boost an allied Hero, restoring <c val="#TooltipNumbers">200</c> Mana. For the next <c val="#TooltipNumbers">8</c> seconds, they gain <c val="#TooltipNumbers">30%</c> Spell Power and their Basic Ability cooldowns recharge <c val="#TooltipNumbers">150%</c> faster.<n/><n/><c val="ffff8a">Cannot be used on Ana.</c>

AnaEyeOfHorusActivate.name: Eye of Horus
AnaEyeOfHorusActivate.ShortTooltip: Fire unlimited range healing and damaging rounds
AnaEyeOfHorusActivate.FullTooltip: Assume a sniping position, gaining the ability to fire up to <c val="#TooltipNumbers">6</c> specialized rounds with unlimited range. Rounds pierce allied and enemy Heroes but collide with enemy Structures in their path. Allies are healed for <c val="#TooltipNumbers">225~~0.04~~</c> and enemies are damaged for <c val="#TooltipNumbers">135~~0.04~~</c>. Deals <c val="#TooltipNumbers">50%</c> less damage to Structures.<n/><n/>Ana is unable to move while Eye of Horus is active.

AnaTraitShrikeSniper.name: Shrike
AnaTraitShrikeSniper.ShortTooltip: Empowers Basic Attacks, Healing Dart, and Sleep Dart
AnaTraitShrikeSniper.FullTooltip: Basic Attacks apply a Dose to enemies, dealing an additional <c val="#TooltipNumbers">40~~0.04~~</c> damage over <c val="#TooltipNumbers">5</c> seconds, and stacking up to <c val="#TooltipNumbers">5</c> times. Every <c val="#TooltipNumbers">0.5</c> seconds, Ana is healed for <c val="#TooltipNumbers">50%</c> of the damage dealt by Shrike.<n/><n/><s val="StandardTooltipHeader">Aim Down Sights</s><n/><n/>Activating Shrike reduces your Movement Speed by <c val="#TooltipNumbers">25%</c>, but increases the Range of Healing Dart and Sleep Dart by <c val="#TooltipNumbers">25%</c> while also allowing them to pierce one Hero. Lasts until canceled.

AnaBioticGrenadeContactHealing.name: Contact Healing
AnaBioticGrenadeContactHealing.ShortTooltip: Increase Biotic Grenade healing on multiple Heroes
AnaBioticGrenadeContactHealing.FullTooltip: Biotic Grenade heals for <c val="#TooltipNumbers">30%</c> more per allied and enemy Hero hit.

AnaSleepingDartSlumberShells.name: Slumber Shells
AnaSleepingDartSlumberShells.FullTooltip: Gain <c val="#TooltipNumbers">25%</c> Movement Speed for <c val="#TooltipNumbers">3</c> seconds after an enemy is affected by Sleep Dart.

AnaShrikeVampiricRounds.name: Vampiric Rounds
AnaShrikeVampiricRounds.FullTooltip: Quest: Stack 5 Doses on an enemy Hero.Reward: Increase Shrike's healing by an additional 1.5%.

AnaBioticGrenadeBioticEnhancements.name: Biotic Enhancements
AnaBioticGrenadeBioticEnhancements.FullTooltip: Increase the bonus healing duration of Biotic Grenade by <c val="#TooltipNumbers">50%</c> and reduce its cooldown by <c val="#TooltipNumbers">2</c> seconds.

AnaOverdose.name: Overdose
AnaOverdose.FullTooltip: Sleep Dart applies <c val="#TooltipNumbers">3</c> Doses. While Aim Down Sights is active, Sleep Dart pierces all enemy Heroes.

AnaDebilitatingDart.name: Debilitating Dart
AnaDebilitatingDart.ShortTooltip: Fire a dart that reduces damage and Slows
AnaDebilitatingDart.FullTooltip: Activate to fire a dart which Slows the Movement Speed and reduces the damage dealt by the first enemy Hero it hits by <c val="#TooltipNumbers">50%</c> for <c val="#TooltipNumbers">4</c> seconds.

AnaBioticGrenadeAntiHealer.name: Anti-Healer
AnaBioticGrenadeAntiHealer.FullTooltip: Increase the area of Biotic Grenade by <c val="#TooltipNumbers">100%</c> and the duration of the healing reduction by <c val="#TooltipNumbers">25%</c>.

AnaSleepDartNightTerrors.name: Night Terrors
AnaSleepDartNightTerrors.FullTooltip: Upon waking, enemy Heroes take <c val="#TooltipNumbers">10%</c> of their Maximum Health in damage. If a Hero is not woken up early, set the cooldown of Sleep Dart to <c val="#TooltipNumbers">5</c> seconds.

AnaMindNumbingAgent.name: Mind-Numbing Agent
AnaMindNumbingAgent.FullTooltip: Every Dose a Hero has reduces their Spell Power by <c val="#TooltipNumbers">10%</c>.

AnaHeroicAbilityNanaBoost.name: Nano Boost
AnaHeroicAbilityNanaBoost.ShortTooltip: Grant ally Spell Power, reduced cooldowns
AnaHeroicAbilityNanaBoost.FullTooltip: Instantly boost an allied Hero, restoring <c val="#TooltipNumbers">200</c> Mana. For the next <c val="#TooltipNumbers">8</c> seconds, they gain <c val="#TooltipNumbers">30%</c> Spell Power and their Basic Ability cooldowns recharge <c val="#TooltipNumbers">150%</c> faster.<n/><n/><c val="ffff8a">Cannot be used on Ana.</c>

AnaHeroicAbilityEyeOfHorus.name: Eye of Horus
AnaHeroicAbilityEyeOfHorus.ShortTooltip: Fire unlimited range healing and damaging rounds
AnaHeroicAbilityEyeOfHorus.FullTooltip: Assume a sniping position, gaining the ability to fire up to <c val="#TooltipNumbers">6</c> specialized rounds with unlimited range. Rounds pierce allied and enemy Heroes but collide with enemy Structures in their path. Allies are healed for <c val="#TooltipNumbers">225~~0.04~~</c> and enemies are damaged for <c val="#TooltipNumbers">135~~0.04~~</c>. Deals <c val="#TooltipNumbers">50%</c> less damage to Structures.<n/><n/>Ana is unable to move while Eye of Horus is active.

AnaHealingDartSpeedSerum.name: Speed Serum
AnaHealingDartSpeedSerum.FullTooltip: Healing Dart grants <c val="#TooltipNumbers">25%</c> Movement Speed to affected Heroes for <c val="#TooltipNumbers">2</c> seconds.

AnaHealingDartPurifyingDarts.name: Purifying Darts
AnaHealingDartPurifyingDarts.FullTooltip: Healing Dart removes Roots and Slows from the target, and heals for <c val="#TooltipNumbers">20%</c> more when doing so.

AnaHealingDartSmellingSalts.name: Smelling Salts
AnaHealingDartSmellingSalts.FullTooltip: Healing Dart removes Stuns from the target, and grants them <c val="#TooltipNumbers">50</c> Armor for <c val="#TooltipNumbers">2</c> seconds when doing so.

AnaHealingDartSharpshooter.name: Sharpshooter
AnaHealingDartSharpshooter.FullTooltip: Healing Dart's healing is increased by <c val="#TooltipNumbers">5%</c> if it heals a Hero, up to <c val="#TooltipNumbers">50%</c>. This bonus is reset if Healing Dart fails to hit a Hero.

AnaHealingDartConcentratedDoses.name: Concentrated Doses
AnaHealingDartConcentratedDoses.FullTooltip: Increase Healing Dart's healing by <c val="#TooltipNumbers">10%</c> for each Dose active on enemy Heroes.

AnaDetachableBoxMagazine.name: Active Reload
AnaDetachableBoxMagazine.FullTooltip: Activate to instantly gain <c val="#TooltipNumbers">3</c> charges of Healing Dart.

AnaNanoInfusion.name: Nano Infusion
AnaNanoInfusion.ShortTooltip: Nano Boost heals for damage dealt
AnaNanoInfusion.FullTooltip: Allies affected by Nano Boost heal for <c val="#TooltipNumbers">50%</c> of Spell Damage dealt.

AnaEyeOfHorusDeadeye.name: Deadeye
AnaEyeOfHorusDeadeye.ShortTooltip: Hitting Heroes increases healing and damage
AnaEyeOfHorusDeadeye.FullTooltip: Increase Eye Of Horus' healing and damage by <c val="#TooltipNumbers">4%</c> for every Hero hit. This bonus resets after all shots have been fired.

AnaShrikeArmoredStance.name: Armored Stance
AnaShrikeArmoredStance.FullTooltip: Increase Shrike's damage by <c val="#TooltipNumbers">50%</c>. While Aim Down Sights is active, gain <c val="#TooltipNumbers">25</c> Armor.

AnaDynamicOptics.name: Dynamic Optics
AnaDynamicOptics.FullTooltip: Basic Attacks increase Attack Speed by <c val="#TooltipNumbers">10%</c> for <c val="#TooltipNumbers">3</c> seconds, up to <c val="#TooltipNumbers">100%</c>. While Aim Down Sights is active, increase your Basic Attack Range by <c val="#TooltipNumbers">4</c>.

Anduin.name: Anduin
Anduin.title: King of Stormwind
Anduin.SearchText: Human Wrynn Priest Stormwind Alliance WoW World of Warcraft Burning Crusade BC Wrath Lich King WotLK Cataclysm Mists of Pandaria MoP Warlords Draenor WoD Legion Hearthstone HS BFA Battle for Azeroth
Anduin.Description: A ranged Healer with the ability to pluck an ally from danger.

AnduinFlashHeal.name: Flash Heal
AnduinFlashHeal.ShortTooltip: Cast a heal on an Ally
AnduinFlashHeal.FullTooltip: Cast for <c val="#TooltipNumbers">0.75</c> seconds to heal an allied Hero for <c val="#TooltipNumbers">260~~0.04~~</c>.

AnduinDivineStar.name: Divine Star
AnduinDivineStar.ShortTooltip: Send a heavenly bolt that damages and heals
AnduinDivineStar.FullTooltip: Send light that deals <c val="#TooltipNumbers">140~~0.04~~</c> damage to enemies and then returns to Anduin, healing allied Heroes for <c val="#TooltipNumbers">130~~0.04~~</c> in a wider path. Healing increases by <c val="#TooltipNumbers">25%</c> per enemy Hero hit.

AnduinChastise.name: Chastise
AnduinChastise.FullTooltip: Shove a swell of light forward, dealing <c val="#TooltipNumbers">145~~0.04~~</c> damage to the first enemy Hero hit and Rooting them for <c val="#TooltipNumbers">1.25</c> seconds.

AnduinHolyWordSalvation.name: Holy Word: Salvation
AnduinHolyWordSalvation.ShortTooltip: Protect and heal allies near Anduin
AnduinHolyWordSalvation.FullTooltip: After <c val="#TooltipNumbers">0.5</c> seconds, Channel to invoke the Light for <c val="#TooltipNumbers">3</c> seconds. While nearby, allied Heroes heal for up to <c val="#TooltipNumbers">25%</c> of their max Health and are Protected.

AnduinLightBomb.name: Lightbomb
AnduinLightBomb.FullTooltip: Imbue an allied Hero with the Light. After <c val="#TooltipNumbers">1.5</c> seconds, it explodes, dealing <c val="#TooltipNumbers">150~~0.04~~</c> damage to enemies and Stunning them for <c val="#TooltipNumbers">1.25</c> seconds.<n/><n/>The target gains a Shield that absorbs <c val="#TooltipNumbers">140~~0.04~~</c> damage per enemy Hero hit. Lasts for <c val="#TooltipNumbers">5</c> seconds.

AnduinLeapOfFaithInstant.name: Leap of Faith
AnduinLeapOfFaithInstant.ShortTooltip: Pull an allied Hero to your location
AnduinLeapOfFaithInstant.FullTooltip: Faith instantly pulls an allied Hero to Anduin's location, granting them Unstoppable while they travel.

AnduinFlashHealRenew.name: Renew
AnduinFlashHealRenew.FullTooltip: Basic Attacks against Heroes empower the next Flash Heal to also heal for <c val="#TooltipNumbers">115~~0.04~~</c> over <c val="#TooltipNumbers">5</c> seconds.

AnduinPursuedByGrace.name: Pursued by Grace
AnduinPursuedByGrace.ShortTooltip: Damage Heroes to heal nearby allies
AnduinPursuedByGrace.FullTooltip: Damaging an enemy Hero heals the lowest Health allied Hero near Anduin for <c val="#TooltipNumbers">28~~0.04~~</c>.

AnduinBoldStrategy.name: Bold Strategy
AnduinBoldStrategy.ShortTooltip: Weaken Flash Heal to gain extra Talents
AnduinBoldStrategy.FullTooltip: Anduin gains his other level <c val="#TooltipNumbers">1</c> Talents, but Flash Heal's cooldown is increased by <c val="#TooltipNumbers">1</c> second.

AnduinDivineStarMoralCompass.name: Moral Compass
AnduinDivineStarMoralCompass.ShortTooltip: Divine Star fires Basic Attacks at its apex
AnduinDivineStarMoralCompass.FullTooltip: Divine Star fires Basic Attacks at <c val="#TooltipNumbers">2</c> Heroes close to its apex for <c val="#TooltipNumbers">70%</c> damage.

AnduinChastiseHolyReach.name: Holy Reach
AnduinChastiseHolyReach.FullTooltip: After hitting an enemy with Chastise, Anduin's next Basic Attack has <c val="#TooltipNumbers">50%</c> more range, <c val="#TooltipNumbers">50%</c> more damage, and heals allied Heroes near Anduin for <c val="#TooltipNumbers">90~~0.04~~</c>.

AnduinInnerFire.name: Inner Fire
AnduinInnerFire.FullTooltip: Increases Attack Speed by <c val="#TooltipNumbers">20%</c> and Basic Attack range by <c val="#TooltipNumbers">15%</c>.

AnduinFlashHealBindingHeal.name: Binding Heal
AnduinFlashHealBindingHeal.FullTooltip: Casting Flash Heal on an ally heals Anduin for <c val="#TooltipNumbers">80~~0.04~~</c>.

AnduinDivineStarPowerWordShield.name: Power Word: Shield
AnduinDivineStarPowerWordShield.ShortTooltip: Divine Star can grant Anduin a Shield
AnduinDivineStarPowerWordShield.FullTooltip: If Divine Star hits an enemy Hero, gain a Shield that absorbs <c val="#TooltipNumbers">165~~0.04~~</c> damage for <c val="#TooltipNumbers">4</c> seconds.

AnduinBlessedRecovery.name: Blessed Recovery
AnduinBlessedRecovery.ShortTooltip: Recover Health after taking high damage
AnduinBlessedRecovery.FullTooltip: If Anduin loses more than <c val="#TooltipNumbers">8%</c> of his maximum Health at once, recover <c val="#TooltipNumbers">15%</c> Health over <c val="#TooltipNumbers">3</c> seconds. <n/><n/>This effect has a <c val="#TooltipNumbers">10</c> second cooldown.

AnduinHolyWordSalvation.name: Holy Word: Salvation
AnduinHolyWordSalvation.ShortTooltip: Protect and heal allies near Anduin
AnduinHolyWordSalvation.FullTooltip: After <c val="#TooltipNumbers">0.5</c> seconds, Channel to invoke the Light for <c val="#TooltipNumbers">3</c> seconds. While nearby, allied Heroes heal for up to <c val="#TooltipNumbers">25%</c> of their max Health and are Protected.

AnduinLightBomb.name: Lightbomb
AnduinLightBomb.FullTooltip: Imbue an allied Hero with the Light. After <c val="#TooltipNumbers">1.5</c> seconds, it explodes, dealing <c val="#TooltipNumbers">150~~0.04~~</c> damage to enemies and Stunning them for <c val="#TooltipNumbers">1.25</c> seconds.<n/><n/>The target gains a Shield that absorbs <c val="#TooltipNumbers">140~~0.04~~</c> damage per enemy Hero hit. Lasts for <c val="#TooltipNumbers">5</c> seconds.

AnduinDivineStarSpeedOfThePious.name: Speed of the Pious
AnduinDivineStarSpeedOfThePious.ShortTooltip: Divine Star grants Anduin Move Speed
AnduinDivineStarSpeedOfThePious.FullTooltip: While Divine Star is traveling, gain <c val="#TooltipNumbers">30%</c> Movement Speed.

AnduinLeapOfFaithEnchantBootsLionsSpeed.name: Enchant Boots - Lion's Speed
AnduinLeapOfFaithEnchantBootsLionsSpeed.ShortTooltip: Leap of Faith grants Move Speed while available
AnduinLeapOfFaithEnchantBootsLionsSpeed.FullTooltip: Gain <c val="#TooltipNumbers">5%</c> Movement Speed. This bonus is tripled while Leap of Faith's cooldown is available.

AnduinPushForward.name: Push Forward!
AnduinPushForward.ShortTooltip: Damage Heroes to gain Move Speed
AnduinPushForward.FullTooltip: Damaging an enemy Hero grants <c val="#TooltipNumbers">3%</c> Movement Speed for <c val="#TooltipNumbers">6</c> seconds, up to <c val="#TooltipNumbers">15%</c>.

AnduinFlashHealEvenhandedBlessings.name: Evenhanded Blessings
AnduinFlashHealEvenhandedBlessings.ShortTooltip: Refund Flash Heal cooldown on new targets
AnduinFlashHealEvenhandedBlessings.FullTooltip: If Flash Heal is cast on a different target from its last, refund <c val="#TooltipNumbers">40%</c> of its cooldown.

AnduinDivineStarHolyNova.name: Holy Nova
AnduinDivineStarHolyNova.FullTooltip: After Anduin catches Divine Star, it explodes, healing nearby allied Heroes for <c val="#TooltipNumbers">100~~0.04~~</c> and damaging enemies for <c val="#TooltipNumbers">100~~0.04~~</c>.

AnduinFlashHealInnerFocus.name: Inner Focus
AnduinFlashHealInnerFocus.ShortTooltip: Activate to reset Flash Heal cooldown
AnduinFlashHealInnerFocus.FullTooltip: Activate to reset the cooldown of Flash Heal and its next cast heals for <c val="#TooltipNumbers">40%</c> more.<n/><n/>Damaging enemy Heroes with Divine Star reduces this cooldown by <c val="#TooltipNumbers">10</c> seconds.

AnduinLightwell.name: Lightwell
AnduinLightwell.ShortTooltip: Activate to summon a healing Lightwell
AnduinLightwell.FullTooltip: Summon a Lightwell that periodically heals a nearby allied Hero for <c val="#TooltipNumbers">75~~0.04~~</c>. The well only fades after healing <c val="#TooltipNumbers">10</c> times or when recast.<n/><n/>This cooldown is reduced by <c val="#TooltipNumbers">1</c> second each time Anduin heals an allied Hero.

AnduinHolyWordSalvationLightOfStormwind.name: Light of Stormwind
AnduinHolyWordSalvationLightOfStormwind.ShortTooltip: Holy Word: Salvation grants allies Move Speed
AnduinHolyWordSalvationLightOfStormwind.FullTooltip: Holy Word: Salvation healing is increased to up to <c val="#TooltipNumbers">30%</c> of maximum Health and upon ending, allied Heroes gain <c val="#TooltipNumbers">40%</c> Movement Speed for <c val="#TooltipNumbers">3</c> seconds.

AnduinLeapOfFaithGlyphOfFaith.name: Glyph of Faith
AnduinLeapOfFaithGlyphOfFaith.ShortTooltip: Leap of Faith gains a charge

AurielBestowHope.name: Bestow Hope

AzmodanTideOfSin.name: Tide of Sin

FirebatIgnite.name: Pyromania
FirebatIgnite.ShortTooltip: Gain Armor and damage nearby enemies
FirebatIgnite.FullTooltip: Gain <c val="#TooltipNumbers">35</c> Armor and deal <c val="#TooltipNumbers">40~~0.04~~</c> damage to nearby enemies every <c val="#TooltipNumbers">0.5</c> seconds for <c val="#TooltipNumbers">4</c> seconds.<n/><n/>Each Hero hit by Flame Stream reduces Pyromania's cooldown by <c val="#TooltipNumbers">5</c> seconds.

FirebatAdrenalineStimpack.name: Adrenaline Stimpack
FirebatAdrenalineStimpack.ShortTooltip: Activate to gain Attack Speed, Move Speed
FirebatAdrenalineStimpack.FullTooltip: Activate to gain <c val="#TooltipNumbers">100%</c> Attack Speed and <c val="#TooltipNumbers">25%</c> Movement Speed for <c val="#TooltipNumbers">5</c> seconds.

FirebatEnduranceStimpack.name: Endurance Stimpack
FirebatEnduranceStimpack.FullTooltip: Activate to gain a Shield that absorbs <c val="#TooltipNumbers">480~~0.04~~</c> damage over <c val="#TooltipNumbers">5</c> seconds.

FirebatNeuralStimpack.name: Neural Stimpack
FirebatNeuralStimpack.ShortTooltip: Activate to increase cooldown recharge rate
FirebatNeuralStimpack.FullTooltip: Activate to gain <c val="#TooltipNumbers">30</c> Mana and cause Basic Ability cooldowns to recharge <c val="#TooltipNumbers">100%</c> faster for <c val="#TooltipNumbers">5</c> seconds.

FirebatNewHabits.name: New Habits
FirebatNewHabits.FullTooltip: Collecting Regeneration Globes reduces the cooldown of Pyromania by 8 seconds.Quest: Collect 15 Regeneration Globes.Reward: Pyromania grants Unstoppable for 2 seconds.

FirebatFlameStreamFeedingtheFlame.name: Feeding the Flame
FirebatFlameStreamFeedingtheFlame.ShortTooltip: Flame Stream can reduce Oil Spill cooldown
FirebatFlameStreamFeedingtheFlame.FullTooltip: Each enemy Hero hit by Flame Stream reduces the cooldown of Oil Spill by <c val="#TooltipNumbers">2</c> seconds and refunds <c val="#TooltipNumbers">5</c> Mana.

FirebatOilSpillAdhesivePetroleum.name: Adhesive Petroleum
FirebatOilSpillAdhesivePetroleum.FullTooltip: Enemies standing in Oil Spill when it is Ignited are Slowed by <c val="#TooltipNumbers">30%</c> for <c val="#TooltipNumbers">2.5</c> seconds.

FirebatOilSpillOilDispersal.name: Oil Dispersal
FirebatOilSpillOilDispersal.FullTooltip: Increase Oil Spill's area by <c val="#TooltipNumbers">20%</c>.

FirebatIgniteMeltdown.name: Meltdown
FirebatIgniteMeltdown.FullTooltip: Hitting an enemy Hero with Pyromania reduces their damage dealt by <c val="#TooltipNumbers">7%</c> for <c val="#TooltipNumbers">2.5</c> seconds, up to <c val="#TooltipNumbers">35%</c>.

FirebatFlameStreamCrossfire.name: Crossfire
FirebatFlameStreamCrossfire.ShortTooltip: Flame Stream can deal bonus damage
FirebatFlameStreamCrossfire.FullTooltip: Hitting an enemy with both streams of Flame Stream deals <c val="#TooltipNumbers">139~~0.04~~</c> bonus damage.

FirebatOilSpillGrillandKill.name: Grill and Kill
FirebatOilSpillGrillandKill.ShortTooltip: <c val="#TooltipQuest">Quest</c>: Increase Ignited Oil Spill damage, duration
FirebatOilSpillGrillandKill.FullTooltip: Quest: Damage enemy Heroes with Ignited Oil Spills 60 times.Reward: Increase Oil Spill's Ignite duration by 2 seconds, and damage by 20%.

FirebatWeaponIncineratorGauntlets.name: Incinerator Gauntlets
FirebatWeaponIncineratorGauntlets.ShortTooltip: Basic Attacks Ignite Oil Spills, area increased
FirebatWeaponIncineratorGauntlets.FullTooltip: Increase Basic Attack area by <c val="#TooltipNumbers">15%</c>, and Basic Attack damage to Minions, Mercenaries, and Monsters by <c val="#TooltipNumbers">70%</c>. Additionally, Basic Attack splashes Ignite Oil Spills.

FirebatHeroicAbilityBunkerDrop.name: Bunker Drop
FirebatHeroicAbilityBunkerDrop.FullTooltip: After <c val="#TooltipNumbers">0.5</c> seconds, deploy and enter a Bunker with <c val="#TooltipNumbers">1435~~0.04~~</c> Health. Blaze and his allies can enter and exit the Bunker at will. While in the Bunker, occupants gain access to Flamethrower, dealing <c val="#TooltipNumbers">170~~0.04~~</c> damage to enemies in a line. <n/><n/>Exiting the Bunker grants <c val="#TooltipNumbers">25</c> Armor for <c val="#TooltipNumbers">2</c> seconds. Bunkers last <c val="#TooltipNumbers">10</c> seconds, or until destroyed.

FirebatHeroicAbilityCombustion.name: Combustion
FirebatHeroicAbilityCombustion.ShortTooltip: Channel to damage and Slow enemies
FirebatHeroicAbilityCombustion.FullTooltip: Channel for up to <c val="#TooltipNumbers">2.6</c> seconds. Upon ending, Slow nearby enemies by <c val="#TooltipNumbers">60%</c> and deal <c val="#TooltipNumbers">55~~0.04~~</c> damage to them every <c val="#TooltipNumbers">0.5</c> seconds. Combustion's Slow and damage over time duration is extended the longer Blaze Channels, from <c val="#TooltipNumbers">1</c> second up to <c val="#TooltipNumbers">5</c> seconds.<n/><n/>Blaze's Movement Speed is reduced by <c val="#TooltipNumbers">40%</c> while Channeling.

FirebatFlameStreamSuppressiveFire.name: Suppressive Fire
FirebatFlameStreamSuppressiveFire.FullTooltip: Each stream of Flame Stream reduces the Spell Power of Heroes hit by <c val="#TooltipNumbers">20%</c> for <c val="#TooltipNumbers">4</c> seconds, up to <c val="#TooltipNumbers">40%</c>.

FirebatOilSpillNanomachineCoating.name: Nanomachine Coating
FirebatOilSpillNanomachineCoating.FullTooltip: Enemies standing in Oil Spills and Ignited Oil Spills have their Attack Speed reduced by <c val="#TooltipNumbers">50%</c> for <c val="#TooltipNumbers">2.5</c> seconds.

FirebatJetPropulsionFuelLeak.name: Fuel Leak
FirebatJetPropulsionFuelLeak.ShortTooltip: Jet Propulsion creates a trail of Oil Spills
FirebatJetPropulsionFuelLeak.FullTooltip: Jet Propulsion creates Oil Spills along Blaze's path. If Jet Propulsion impacts an enemy Hero, an additional Oil Spill is created underneath them.

FirebatJetPropulsionThermalProtection.name: Thermal Protection
FirebatJetPropulsionThermalProtection.ShortTooltip: Jet Propulsion hits grant Armor, reduce cooldown
FirebatJetPropulsionThermalProtection.FullTooltip: Each enemy hit by Jet Propulsion grants <c val="#TooltipNumbers">10</c> Armor for <c val="#TooltipNumbers">3</c> seconds and reduces its cooldown by <c val="#TooltipNumbers">1.5</c> seconds.

FirebatIgniteHeatTreatment.name: Heat Treatment
FirebatIgniteHeatTreatment.FullTooltip: Heal for <c val="#TooltipNumbers">75%</c> of the damage dealt by Pyromania.

FirebatActiveJuggernautPlating.name: Juggernaut Plating
FirebatActiveJuggernautPlating.ShortTooltip: Gain Spell Armor, then Shield for damage taken
FirebatActiveJuggernautPlating.FullTooltip: Activate to gain <c val="#TooltipNumbers">50</c> Spell Armor for <c val="#TooltipNumbers">3</c> seconds. Upon expiration, gain a Shield equal to <c val="#TooltipNumbers">125%</c> of the Spell Damage taken while Juggernaut Plating was active.

FirebatBunkerDropFortifiedBunker.name: Fortified Bunker
FirebatBunkerDropFortifiedBunker.ShortTooltip: Allies can cast Oil Spill from Bunker Drop
FirebatBunkerDropFortifiedBunker.FullTooltip: Occupants can cast Oil Spill from Bunker Drop every <c val="#TooltipNumbers">6</c> seconds. Additionally, Bunker Drop's Armor bonus upon exiting is increased by <c val="#TooltipNumbers">25</c>, and its duration by <c val="#TooltipNumbers">1</c> second.

FirebatCombustionFlashFire.name: Flash Fire
FirebatCombustionFlashFire.ShortTooltip: Combustion Slows, remove Move Speed penalty
FirebatCombustionFlashFire.FullTooltip: While Channeling Combustion, Blaze's Movement Speed is no longer reduced, and nearby enemies are Slowed by <c val="#TooltipNumbers">60%</c>.

FirebatWeaponBurnNotice.name: Burn Notice
FirebatWeaponBurnNotice.ShortTooltip: Basic Attacks Slow, damage over time
FirebatWeaponBurnNotice.FullTooltip: Basic Attacks Slow enemies by <c val="#TooltipNumbers">5%</c> and deal an additional <c val="#TooltipNumbers">18~~0.04~~</c> damage over <c val="#TooltipNumbers">2.5</c> seconds. Stacks up to <c val="#TooltipNumbers">5</c> times.

Brightwing.name: Brightwing
Brightwing.title: Faerie Dragon
Brightwing.SearchText: Brightwing BW Sprite Darter Faerie Dragon WoW World of Warcraft Legion Heroes of the Storm
Brightwing.Description: A Healer who can teleport to allies, excelling on large battlegrounds.

FaerieDragonArcaneFlare.name: Arcane Flare
FaerieDragonArcaneFlare.FullTooltip: Shoot a flare dealing <c val="#TooltipNumbers">75~~0.04~~</c> damage to enemies hit, and an additional <c val="#TooltipNumbers">105~~0.04~~</c> damage to enemies in the center. If a Hero is hit by the center, Soothing Mist's passive healing instantly activates.

FaerieDragonPolymorph.name: Polymorph
FaerieDragonPolymorph.FullTooltip: Polymorph a target for <c val="#TooltipNumbers">1.5</c> seconds, Slowing their Movement Speed by <c val="#TooltipNumbers">25%</c> and Silencing them. Targets are not able to attack while Polymorphed.

FaerieDragonPixieDust.name: Pixie Dust
FaerieDragonPixieDust.ShortTooltip: Increase a Hero's Movement Speed and grant Spell Armor
FaerieDragonPixieDust.FullTooltip: Increase target Hero's Movement Speed by <c val="#TooltipNumbers">20%</c>, and grant them <c val="#TooltipNumbers">25</c> Spell Armor for <c val="#TooltipNumbers">3</c> seconds, reducing Spell damage taken by <c val="#TooltipNumbers">25%</c>.

FaerieDragonBlinkHealDash.name: Blink Heal
FaerieDragonBlinkHealDash.ShortTooltip: Teleport to allies and heal them
FaerieDragonBlinkHealDash.FullTooltip: Teleport to a nearby ally. When teleporting to a Hero, heal them for <c val="#TooltipNumbers">200~~0.04~~</c>.<n/><n/>Stores up to <c val="#TooltipNumbers">2</c> charges.

FaerieDragonEmeraldWind.name: Emerald Wind
FaerieDragonEmeraldWind.ShortTooltip: Damages and pushes enemies in area
FaerieDragonEmeraldWind.FullTooltip: After <c val="#TooltipNumbers">0.5</c> seconds, create an expanding nova of wind, dealing <c val="#TooltipNumbers">225~~0.04~~ </c>damage and pushing enemies away.

BrightwingCalmingMist.name: Soothing Mist
BrightwingCalmingMist.FullTooltip: Activate to remove all Stun, Root, Slow, and Silence effects from nearby allied Heroes.<n/><n/><c val="#AbilityPassive">Passive:</c> Brightwing heals nearby allied Heroes for <c val="#TooltipNumbers">105~~0.04~~</c> every <c val="#TooltipNumbers">4</c> seconds

BrightwingPhaseShift.name: Phase Shift
BrightwingPhaseShift.ShortTooltip: Teleport to an allied Hero and heal them
BrightwingPhaseShift.FullTooltip: After <c val="#TooltipNumbers">2</c> seconds, teleport to an allied Hero and heal them for <c val="#TooltipNumbers">20%</c> of their maximum Health.

BrightwingGreaterPolymorphPolymorph.name: Greater Polymorph
BrightwingGreaterPolymorphPolymorph.FullTooltip: Increase Polymorph's range by <c val="#TooltipNumbers">30%</c>. Hero Takedowns refresh the cooldown of Polymorph.

BrightwingPhaseShiftHyperShift.name: Hyper Shift
BrightwingPhaseShiftHyperShift.FullTooltip: Increase Phase Shift's healing by an additional <c val="#TooltipNumbers">10%</c> of the target's maximum Health. Nearby enemy Minion deaths reduce Phase Shift's cooldown by <c val="#TooltipNumbers">2</c> seconds.

BrightwingPixieCharm.name: Pixie Charm
BrightwingPixieCharm.ShortTooltip: Activate to instantly defeat a Mercenary
BrightwingPixieCharm.FullTooltip: Activate to consume <c val="#TooltipNumbers">20</c> stacks of Bribe to instantly defeat an uncaptured non-Elite Mercenary.<n/><n/><c val="#AbilityPassive">Passive:</c> Gain <c val="#TooltipNumbers">1</c> stack of Bribe when a nearby enemy Minion dies, and <c val="#TooltipNumbers">5</c> stacks when hitting an enemy Hero with Arcane Flare's center. Maximum <c val="#TooltipNumbers">80</c> stacks.

BrightwingDreamShotArcaneFlare.name: Dream Shot
BrightwingDreamShotArcaneFlare.ShortTooltip: Arcane Flare center hits reduce cooldown
BrightwingDreamShotArcaneFlare.FullTooltip: Increase Arcane Flare's range by <c val="#TooltipNumbers">50%</c>. Hitting a Hero with Arcane Flare's center reduces its cooldown to <c val="#TooltipNumbers">2</c> seconds.

BrightwingUnstableAnomalyPolymorph.name: Unstable Anomaly
BrightwingUnstableAnomalyPolymorph.FullTooltip: Increase Polymorph's Slow by <c val="#TooltipNumbers">15%</c>. Upon expiration, Polymorph deals damage to nearby enemy Heroes equal to <c val="#TooltipNumbers">2%</c> of their maximum Health.

BrightwingMagicSpit.name: Magic Spit
BrightwingMagicSpit.ShortTooltip: Basic Attacks reduce Soothing Mist cooldown
BrightwingMagicSpit.FullTooltip: Increase Basic Attack range by <c val="#TooltipNumbers">1.1</c>. Basic Attacks against Heroes reduce the cooldown of Soothing Mist by <c val="#TooltipNumbers">5</c> seconds.

BrightwingArcaneFlareStickyFlare.name: Sticky Flare
BrightwingArcaneFlareStickyFlare.FullTooltip: Enemy Heroes hit by Arcane Flare have their Movement Speed Slowed by <c val="#TooltipNumbers">20%</c> for <c val="#TooltipNumbers">3</c> seconds. Increase the Slow to <c val="#TooltipNumbers">40%</c> if they are hit by the center portion.

BrightwingPhaseShiftPeekaboo.name: Peekaboo!
BrightwingPhaseShiftPeekaboo.ShortTooltip: Phase Shift grants a Shield, reveals an area
BrightwingPhaseShiftPeekaboo.FullTooltip: Phase Shifting to an ally grants both Brightwing and her target a <c val="#TooltipNumbers">335~~0.04~~</c> point Shield and reveals a large area around them for <c val="#TooltipNumbers">5</c> seconds.

BrightwingCriticalMistCalmingMist.name: Critical Mist
BrightwingCriticalMistCalmingMist.FullTooltip: If Soothing Mist removes a disabling effect from an ally, heal them for <c val="#TooltipNumbers">250~~0.04~~</c>.

FaerieDragonHeroicAbilityBlinkHeal.name: Blink Heal
FaerieDragonHeroicAbilityBlinkHeal.ShortTooltip: Teleport to allies and heal them
FaerieDragonHeroicAbilityBlinkHeal.FullTooltip: Teleport to a nearby ally. When teleporting to a Hero, heal them for <c val="#TooltipNumbers">200~~0.04~~</c>.<n/><n/>Stores up to <c val="#TooltipNumbers">2</c> charges.

FaerieDragonHeroicAbilityEmeraldWind.name: Emerald Wind
FaerieDragonHeroicAbilityEmeraldWind.ShortTooltip: Damages and pushes enemies in area
FaerieDragonHeroicAbilityEmeraldWind.FullTooltip: After <c val="#TooltipNumbers">0.5</c> seconds, create an expanding nova of wind, dealing <c val="#TooltipNumbers">225~~0.04~~ </c>damage and pushing enemies away.

BrightwingPixieBoostPixieDust.name: Pixie Boost
BrightwingPixieBoostPixieDust.ShortTooltip: Pixie Dust grants an additional burst of speed
BrightwingPixieBoostPixieDust.FullTooltip: Pixie Dust gives <c val="#TooltipNumbers">40%</c> bonus Movement Speed, decaying to <c val="#TooltipNumbers">20%</c> over <c val="#TooltipNumbers">3</c> seconds.

BrightwingPixieDustSafetyDust.name: Safety Dust
BrightwingPixieDustSafetyDust.FullTooltip: Increase Pixie Dust's duration by <c val="#TooltipNumbers">1</c> second. Brightwing heals allies with an active Pixie Dust for <c val="#TooltipNumbers">25%</c> more.

BrightwingPixieDustPixiePower.name: Pixie Power
BrightwingPixieDustPixiePower.ShortTooltip: Reduce Pixie Dust cooldown, increase Spell Armor
BrightwingPixieDustPixiePower.FullTooltip: Reduce the cooldown of Pixie Dust by <c val="#TooltipNumbers">3</c> seconds and increase the Spell Armor granted by <c val="#TooltipNumbers">25</c>.

BrightwingArcaneFlareHush_x0021_.name: Hush!
BrightwingArcaneFlareHush_x0021_.ShortTooltip: Arcane Flare center Silences, reduces damage
BrightwingArcaneFlareHush_x0021_.FullTooltip: Enemy Heroes hit by the center of Arcane Flare are Silenced for <c val="#TooltipNumbers">1</c> second and deal <c val="#TooltipNumbers">25%</c> less damage for <c val="#TooltipNumbers">3</c> seconds.

FaerieDragonMasteryCritterize.name: Critterize
FaerieDragonMasteryCritterize.FullTooltip: While Polymorphed, the target's Armor is reduced by <c val="#TooltipNumbers">25</c>, increasing the damage they take by <c val="#TooltipNumbers">25%</c>.

BrightwingPhaseOut.name: Phase Out
BrightwingPhaseOut.FullTooltip: Activate to place Brightwing in Stasis for <c val="#TooltipNumbers">0.75</c> seconds.

BrightwingInvisibleFriends.name: Invisible Friends
BrightwingInvisibleFriends.FullTooltip: Blink Heal grants Stealth to Brightwing. If Blink Heal is cast on a Hero, they are also granted Stealth. While Stealthed by Invisible Friends, Heroes heal for <c val="#TooltipNumbers">20~~0.04~~</c> Health per second and are Unrevealable for the first <c val="#TooltipNumbers">0.5</c> seconds<n/><n/>Remaining stationary for at least <c val="#TooltipNumbers">1.5</c> seconds while Stealthed grants Invisible.

BrightwingIntensiveWinds.name: Intensive Winds
BrightwingIntensiveWinds.ShortTooltip: Reduce Emerald Wind cooldown, increase cost
BrightwingIntensiveWinds.FullTooltip: Permanently reduce Emerald Wind's cooldown to <c val="#TooltipNumbers">5</c> seconds and increase its Mana cost to <c val="#TooltipNumbers">200</c>.

BrightwingFaerieProtector.name: Faerie Protector
BrightwingFaerieProtector.FullTooltip: Activate to apply Pixie Dust to all nearby Heroes.
